sourcesContent:
import {
  Space,
  Divider,
  Button,
  Avatar,
  FileButton,
  Title,
  Flex,
  Container,
  SimpleGrid,
  TextInput,
  UnstyledButton,
} from "@mantine/core";

const Account = () => {
  return (
    <Container>
      <Flex justify="center" my="lg">
        <Title>Edit Profile</Title>
      </Flex>
      <Flex justify="center" my="xl">
        <FileButton>
          {(props) => (
            <UnstyledButton {...props}>
              <Avatar size={150} radius={150} src={user.avatar} />
            </UnstyledButton>
          )}
        </FileButton>
      </Flex>
      <SimpleGrid columns={1} breakpoints={[{ minWidth: "sm", cols: 2 }]}>
        <TextInput label="First Name" defaultValue={user.firstName} />
        <TextInput label="Last Name" defaultValue={user.surName} />
      </SimpleGrid>
      <TextInput label="Email" defaultValue={user.email} />
      <TextInput label="Phone" defaultValue={user.phone} />

      <Divider mt="xl" mb="xl" />

      <Flex justify="center" my="lg">
        <Title>Edit Adress</Title>
      </Flex>
      <TextInput
        label="Adress line 1"
        placeholder="Street name and house number"
      />
      <TextInput label="Adress line 2" placeholder="Apartment, unit etc." />
      <TextInput label="City" placeholder="City/Town" />
      <TextInput label="Zip" placeholder="Postcode/Zip" />
      <TextInput label="County" placeholder="Country" />

      <Space h="xl" />
      <Flex justify="center">
        <Button variant="filled" mt="xl" fullWidth>
          Save
        </Button>
      </Flex>
    </Container>
  );
};

export default Account;
